design_philosophy.vibe: The Performance Pro (Data Edition) - Precise, Fast, Intelligent
anti_patterns: No generic 'Chatbot' layouts (input at bottom, empty screen)
No center-aligned text blocks for data

QueryInput.description: The 'Hero' component. Not just an input. A command center.
QueryInput.style: Large, centered initially, moves to top on interaction. Glassmorphism background. High elevation (shadow-2xl).
QueryInput.props: placeholder='Ask your data a question...', autoFocus=true

SQLDisplay.description: Editable code block showing the generated SQL.
SQLDisplay.style: Monospace font, dark theme syntax highlighting, copy button, 'Run Query' action button (Accent Color).

ResultsTable.style: Dense, sticky header, hover rows, minimal borders. No vertical lines inside table.
ResultsTable.features: Pagination, Sortable columns, Export to CSV

SchemaViewer.description: Visual representation of the database schema.
SchemaViewer.style: Tree view or Accordion list in the sidebar. Icons for tables and columns (Key icon for PK).

HistorySidebar.description: List of past natural language queries.
HistorySidebar.style: Timeline style. Small text. Click to restore.

visual_enhancers.grid_borders: Use 'divide-y divide-border' for lists and 'border border-border' for cards.
visual_enhancers.tracing_beam: Use on the active query card or the 'Generating...' state.
visual_enhancers.noise_texture: Overlay a subtle noise texture on the background to reduce digital flatness.

stream_text.description: Typewriter effect for the SQL generation.

background_texture.description: Subtle dark woven texture for sidebar or modal backgrounds (use with low opacity overlay).

instructions_to_main_agent: CRITICAL: Use .js extension for all React components (e.g., QueryInput.js).
CRITICAL: Do not use 'Inter' font. Use 'Outfit' for headings and 'Manrope' for body.
CRITICAL: Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid'.
CRITICAL: The 'Query Input' must be the focal point. Use a large text area with a 'Generate' button that uses the Accent color (#F97316).
CRITICAL: Use 'sonner' for toast notifications (e.g., 'Query executed successfully').
CRITICAL: Implement a 'Dark Mode' toggle, but default to Dark Mode.
CRITICAL: For the SQL display, use a library like 'react-syntax-highlighter' or a simple pre/code block with custom styling if libraries are restricted.
CRITICAL: The 'Results Table' must handle empty states gracefully (show a 'No results found' illustration or text).
CRITICAL: Use 'lucide-react' for icons (Database, Play, History, Code, Table).
CRITICAL: Do not use gradients for the main background. Use a solid dark color (#09090B) with the provided noise texture or subtle grid lines.
CRITICAL: Follow the 'Bento Grid' layout for the dashboard view (if displaying multiple widgets).
universal_guidelines: Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
